long_desc.thetext:
Click through the following links/URLs: http://qooxdoo.org/ - qooxdoo home http://qooxdoo.org/docs - docs http://qooxdoo.org/contrib - More - Contributions http://qooxdoo.org/contrib/usage - Usage http://qooxdoo.org/contrib/usage/contrib_application_integration_guide - how to integrate a contribution into your application http://qooxdoo.org/docs/1.0/tool/generator_config_articles#contrib_libraries - Contrib libraries
You get a "This topic does not exist yet" page (I assume it's a 404).
I believe what's desired is that the last link points to http://manual.qooxdoo.org/current/pages/desktop/ui_using_themes_of_contribs.html instead.
But even this is a bit wrong - the content says how to use a generic contrib via config.json, it doesn't refer strictly to themes.
Even if the documentation was fixed, there's yet another bug: since the move to allura, the contrib URLs seem to have changed, so the content of the examples should be changed accordingly.
Move open issues to RESOLVED â€“ LATER, whose last comment is older than a year.
